description.value:
After you enact any other plan, you may use this plan as a free action to inspire your team. You and up to six of your allies that can see or hear you gain temporary hit points equal to your [[/r @abilities.int.mod]]{Intelligence modifier}.

Level 3: You and your allies gain temporary hit points equal to [[/r 1d4+@abilities.int.mod]]{1d4 + your Intelligence modifier} instead.

Level 5: You and your allies gain temporary hit points equal to [[/r 1d4+@abilities.int.mod]]{2d4 + your Intelligence modifier} instead.

Level 7: You and your allies gain temporary hit points equal to [[/r 1d4+@abilities.int.mod]]{3d4 + your Intelligence modifier} instead.

Level 9: You and your allies gain temporary hit points equal to [[/r 1d4+@abilities.int.mod]]{4d4 + your Intelligence modifier} instead.

activation.condition: After you enact any other plan.
